channel.title: How to delete the bit where it says Server ip: and port:?
channel.description: Well guys i need a little help to delete them and like leave only Username and password so ppls dont have to type in the ip and port all they need 2 do is to type in the password :) and username

item.title: How to delete the bit where it says Server ip: and port:?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Find the words “server IP” in your client class and delete any code that has to do with writing the words on the interface and changing the typing field to that spot.
Hint: method135 and method140 (non-refactored client)
Wrong section, by the way.

Read full topic
item.source: How to delete the bit where it says Server ip: and port:?
